name: COVID-19 (Severe)
description: Very severe respiratory confirmed covid vs. population
label: COVID-19 (Severe)

name: Long COVID
description: Long Covid (strict definition) vs. population (broad definition)
label: Long COVID

name: COVID-19 Vaccine Dose 1
description: Anti-SARS-CoV-2 spike protein IgG seronegativity after first dose of COVID-19 vaccine
label: COVID-19 Vaccine Dose 1

name: COVID-19 Vaccine Dose 2
description: Anti-SARS-CoV-2 spike protein IgG seronegativity after second dose of COVID-19 vaccine
label: COVID-19 Vaccine Dose 2

name: Cardiometabolic multimorbidity
description: Cardiometabolic multimorbidity (stroke, type 2 diabetes mellitus, coronary artery disease)
label: Cardiometabolic multimorbidity

name: Platelet count
description: Count of platelets per unit volume of blood
label: Platelet count

name: Platelet distribution width
description: The spread of the platelet volume distribution. Note that Sysmex and Coulter use different statistics to measure spread.
label: Platelet distribution width

name: Plateletcrit
description: Volume fraction of blood occupied by platelets
label: Plateletcrit

name: Red blood cell count
description: Count of red blood cells per unit volume of blood
label: Red blood cell count

name: Mean corpuscular volume
description: Mean volume of red blood cells
label: Mean corpuscular vol.

name: Hematocrit
description: Volume fraction of blood occupied by red cells
label: Hematocrit

name: Mean corpuscular hemoglobin
description: Average mass of hemoglobin per red cell
label: Mean corpuscular Hb

name: Mean sphered corpuscular volume
description: Mean volume of sphered red cells
label: Mean sphered corpuscular vol.

name: Mean corpuscular hemoglobin concentration
description: Concentration of hemoglobin with respect to unit of volume occupied by red cells
label: Mean corpuscular Hb concentration

name: Hemoglobin concentration
description: Concentration of hemoglobin with respect to unit of volume of blood
label: Hb concentration

name: Red cell distribution width
description: Coefficient of variation of red cell volume distribution
label: Red cell distribution width

name: Reticulocyte count
description: Count of reticulocytes per unit volume of blood
label: Reticulocyte count

name: Reticulocyte fraction of red cells
description: Percentage of red blood cells that are reticulocytes
label: Reticulocyte fraction of RBC

name: Immature fraction of reticulocytes
description: Fraction of reticulocytes with high RNA content, as measured by light scatter
label: Immature fraction of reticulocytes

name: High light scatter reticulocyte count
description: Count of high RNA content (immature) reticulocytes per unit volume of blood
label: High light scatter reticulocyte count

name: High light scatter reticulocyte percentage of red cells
description: Immature reticulocyte count as a percentage of red blood cell count
label: High light scatter reticulocyte % of RBC

name: Monocyte count
description: Count of monocytes per unit volume of blood
label: Monocyte count

name: Neutrophil count
description: Count of neutrophils per unit volume of blood
label: Neutrophil count

name: Eosinophil count
description: Count of eosinophils per unit volume of blood
label: Eosinophil count

name: Basophil count
description: Count of basophils per unit volume of blood
label: Basophil count

name: Lymphocyte count
description: Aggregate count of lymphoid cells per unit volume of blood
label: Lymphocyte count

name: White blood cell count
description: Aggregate count of white cells per unit volume of blood
label: White blood cell count

name: Monocyte percentage of white cells
description: Percentage of white cells that are monocytes
label: Monocyte % of WBC

name: Neutrophil percentage of white cells
description: Percentage of white cells that are neutrophils
label: Neutrophil % of WBC

name: Estimated heel bone mineral density
description: Ultrasound estimated bone mineral density of the heel (eBMD)
label: Estimated heel BMD

name: Femur neck bone mineral density
description: DXA derived bone mineral density of the femoral neck of the hip (fBMD)
label: Femur neck BMD

name: Lumbar spine bone mineral density
description: DXA derived bone mineral density of the lumbar spine (LsBMD)
label: Lumbar spine BMD

name: Skull bone mineral density
description: DXA derived bone mineral density of the skull (SkBMD)
label: Skull BMD

name: Whole body mineral density
description: DXA derived bone mineral density of the whole body (WbBMD)
label: Whole body BMD
